member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LoggingExtensionMethods.LogEnter(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Arguments},System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Logs the method name, arguments, file and line number after '>>>' as debug category.
member.param: Add parameters to this object to log them.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LoggingExtensionMethods.LogExit(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Arguments},System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Logs the method name, arguments, file and line number after '<<<' as debug category.
member.param: Add parameters to this object to log them.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LoggingExtensionMethods.LogMessage(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.String,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Arguments},System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Logs the message, method name, arguments, file and line number after '###' as debug category.
member.param: The message that should be logged
Add parameters to this object to log them.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LoggingExtensionMethods.LogException(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger,System.Exception,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Arguments},Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LogLevel,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Logs the exception, method name, arguments, file and line number after '>>>' with the specified log level.
member.param: The exception that should be logged
The log level used for this entry (Default: Error).
Add parameters to this object to log them.
